name: AzureRole
help: Manage user roles for access control with Azure Active Directory and service principals.

properties.name: Role
properties.help: Role name or id.

properties.name: Assignee
properties.help: Represent a user, group, or service principal. supported format: object id, user sign-in name, or service principal name.

properties.name: AssigneeObjectId
properties.help: Assignee's graph object id, such as the 'principal id' from a managed service identity. Use this instead of '--assignee' to bypass graph permission issues.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Use it only if the role or assignment was added at the level of a resource group.

properties.name: Scope
properties.help: Scope at which the role assignment or definition applies to, e.g., /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333, /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup, or /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM.

properties.name: Assignee
properties.help: Represent a user, group, or service principal. supported format: object id, user sign-in name, or service principal name.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: Space-separated role assignment ids.

properties.name: IncludeInherited
properties.help: Include assignments applied on parent scopes.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Use it only if the role or assignment was added at the level of a resource group.

properties.name: Role
properties.help: Role name or id.

properties.name: Scope
properties.help: Scope at which the role assignment or definition applies to, e.g., /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333, /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup, or /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM.

properties.name: All
properties.help: Show all assignments under the current subscription.

properties.name: Assignee
properties.help: Represent a user, group, or service principal. supported format: object id, user sign-in name, or service principal name.

properties.name: IncludeClassicAdministrators
properties.help: List default role assignments for subscription classic administrators, aka co-admins.

properties.name: IncludeGroups
properties.help: Include extra assignments to the groups of which the user is a member(transitively).

properties.name: IncludeInherited
properties.help: Include assignments applied on parent scopes.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Use it only if the role or assignment was added at the level of a resource group.

properties.name: Role
properties.help: Role name or id.

properties.name: Scope
properties.help: Scope at which the role assignment or definition applies to, e.g., /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333, /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup, or /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.help: The end time of the query in the format of %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ, e.g. 2000-12-31T12:59:59Z. Defaults to the current time.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.help: The start time of the query in the format of %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ, e.g. 2000-12-31T12:59:59Z. Defaults to 1 Hour prior to the current time.

properties.name: RoleDefinition
properties.help: Description of a role as JSON, or a path to a file containing a JSON description.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The role's name.

properties.name: CustomRoleOnly
properties.help: Custom roles only(vs. build-in ones).

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Use it only if the role or assignment was added at the level of a resource group.

properties.name: Scope
properties.help: Scope at which the role assignment or definition applies to, e.g., /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333, /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup, or /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM.

properties.name: CustomRoleOnly
properties.help: Custom roles only(vs. build-in ones).

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The role's name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Use it only if the role or assignment was added at the level of a resource group.

properties.name: Scope
properties.help: Scope at which the role assignment or definition applies to, e.g., /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333, /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup, or /subscriptions/0b1f6471-1bf0-4dda-aec3-111122223333/resourceGroups/myGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/myVM.

properties.name: RoleDefinition
properties.help: Description of a role as JSON, or a path to a file containing a JSON description.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
